nodes.text: Star Wars by Jason Aaron Omnibus

Star Wars by Jason Aaron Omnibus is a canon hardcover  Omnibus that primarily collects issues 1–37 of the Marvel comic-book series Star Wars from author Jason Aaron. It also collects issues from the Star Wars: Vader Down, Star Wars: Darth Vader, Star Wars: Doctor Aphra, and Star Wars: The Screaming Citadel series. The omnibus was published by Marvel Comics on March 19, 2019.

When Star Wars returned to Marvel, Jason Aaron was the ideal candidate to steer the rebels into all-new adventures! Now Aaron's entire saga is collected in full! The Death Star has been destroyed - but the Empire isn't toppled yet! Join Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia, Han Solo, Chewbacca, C-3PO and R2-D2 as they continue the fight for freedom against Darth Vader! Luke battles Boba Fett! A woman from Han Solo's past returns! The Dark Lord crash-lands - but you can't keep Vader down for long! And the roguish Doctor Aphra lures Luke to the Screaming Citadel!
COLLECTING: STAR WARS 1-37, STAR WARS: VADER DOWN 1, DARTH VADER 13-15, STAR WARS: DOCTOR APHRA 7-8, STAR WARS: THE SCREAMING CITADEL 1, STAR WARS ANNUAL 1-3
